languages.text: "Нет! Как же символ? Знамение? Вы... вы должны..." {n}Уставшие глаза Мертвеца наполняются ужасом, перерождающимся в истерику. Ноги бродяги подкашиваются, и, тяжело качнувшись, c жалобным воплем он валится на рельсы.{/n} "Нет! Помогите!"

"No! What about the symbol? The portent? You... you were supposed to..." {n}The man's tired eyes fill with horror that quickly turns into hysteria. His knees buckle, and he staggers heavily before falling onto the tracks with a pitiful cry.{/n} "No! Help!"
languages.original_text: "Нет! Как же символ? Знамение? Вы... вы должны..." {n}Уставшие глаза Мертвеца наполняются ужасом, перерождающимся в истерику. Ноги бродяги подкашиваются, и, тяжело качнувшись, c жалобным воплем он валится на рельсы.{/n} "Нет! Помогите!"

traits.locale_text: "No! What about the symbol? The portent? You... you were supposed to..." {n}The man's tired eyes fill with horror that quickly turns into hysteria. His knees buckle, and he staggers heavily before falling onto the tracks with a pitiful cry.{/n} "No! Help!"

"No! What about the symbol? The portent? You... you were supposed to..." {n}The man's tired eyes fill with horror that quickly turns into hysteria. His knees buckle, and he staggers heavily before falling onto the tracks with a pitiful cry.{/n} "No! Help!"

"No! What about the symbol? The portent? You... you were supposed to..." {n}The man's tired eyes fill with horror that quickly turns into hysteria. His knees buckle, and he staggers heavily before falling onto the tracks with a pitiful cry.{/n} "No! Help!"
"No! What about the symbol? The portent? You... you were supposed to..." {n}His tired eyes fill with horror.{/n} "I'll do it myself, then. But... not today. Another time."

"No! What about the symbol? The portent? You... you were supposed to..." {n}The man's tired eyes fill with horror that quickly turns into hysteria. His knees buckle, and he staggers heavily before falling onto the tracks with a pitiful cry.{/n} "No! Help!"

"No! What about the symbol? The portent? You... you were supposed to..." {n}The man's tired eyes fill with horror that quickly turns into hysteria. His knees buckle, and he staggers heavily before falling onto the tracks with a pitiful cry.{/n} "No! Help!"

"No! What about the symbol? The portent? You... you were supposed to..." {n}The man's tired eyes fill with horror that quickly turns into hysteria. His knees buckle, and he staggers heavily before falling onto the tracks with a pitiful cry.{/n} "No! Help!"

languages.text: « Non ! Et le symbole ? Le présage ? Vous... vous deviez... » {n}Les yeux las de l'homme s'emplissent d'une horreur qui tourne rapidement à l'hystérie. Ses genoux cèdent sous son poids, et il chancelle maladroitement avant de s'effondrer sur les rails avec un cri pitoyable.{/n} « Non ! À l'aide ! »
languages.original_text: "No! What about the symbol? The portent? You... you were supposed to..." {n}The man's tired eyes fill with horror that quickly turns into hysteria. His knees buckle, and he staggers heavily before falling onto the tracks with a pitiful cry.{/n} "No! Help!"

traits.locale_text: « Non ! Et le symbole ? Le présage ? Vous... vous deviez... » {n}Les yeux las de l'homme s'emplissent d'une horreur qui tourne rapidement à l'hystérie. Ses genoux cèdent sous son poids, et il chancelle maladroitement avant de s'effondrer sur les rails avec un cri pitoyable.{/n} « Non ! À l'aide ! »

languages.text: «¡No! ¿Pero qué hay del símbolo? ¿Del augurio? Usted... se suponía que debía...». {n}Los ojos cansados del hombre se llenan de un pánico que rápidamente da paso a la histeria. Le flaquean las rodillas y da un par de tumbos antes de desplomarse sobre las vías con un lastimoso quejido.{/n} «¡No! ¡Socorro!».
languages.original_text: "No! What about the symbol? The portent? You... you were supposed to..." {n}The man's tired eyes fill with horror that quickly turns into hysteria. His knees buckle, and he staggers heavily before falling onto the tracks with a pitiful cry.{/n} "No! Help!"

traits.locale_text: «¡No! ¿Pero qué hay del símbolo? ¿Del augurio? Usted... se suponía que debía...». {n}Los ojos cansados del hombre se llenan de un pánico que rápidamente da paso a la histeria. Le flaquean las rodillas y da un par de tumbos antes de desplomarse sobre las vías con un lastimoso quejido.{/n} «¡No! ¡Socorro!».

languages.text: 「やめてください！シンボルはどうなんです？前兆は？あなたは…そんな…」{n}男の疲れた目に恐怖が満ち、あっというまに恐慌状態に陥る。膝が崩れ、大きくよろめくと情けない叫び声とともに線路へと倒れこむ。{/n}「いやだ！助けてくれ！」
languages.original_text: "No! What about the symbol? The portent? You... you were supposed to..." {n}The man's tired eyes fill with horror that quickly turns into hysteria. His knees buckle, and he staggers heavily before falling onto the tracks with a pitiful cry.{/n} "No! Help!"

traits.locale_text: 「やめてください！シンボルはどうなんです？前兆は？あなたは…そんな…」{n}男の疲れた目に恐怖が満ち、あっというまに恐慌状態に陥る。膝が崩れ、大きくよろめくと情けない叫び声とともに線路へと倒れこむ。{/n}「いやだ！助けてくれ！」

languages.text: “不！可那个符号是怎么回事？那预兆呢？你……你本该……”{n}他疲惫的双眼中顿时充满了恐惧，随后仿佛发癫一样。他的膝盖猛地软了下去，身体重重地砸在铁轨上。他发出了悲惨的高喊声。{/n}“不！救救我！”
languages.original_text: "No! What about the symbol? The portent? You... you were supposed to..." {n}The man's tired eyes fill with horror that quickly turns into hysteria. His knees buckle, and he staggers heavily before falling onto the tracks with a pitiful cry.{/n} "No! Help!"

traits.locale_text: “不！可那个符号是怎么回事？那预兆呢？你……你本该……”{n}他疲惫的双眼中顿时充满了恐惧，随后仿佛发癫一样。他的膝盖猛地软了下去，身体重重地砸在铁轨上。他发出了悲惨的高喊声。{/n}“不！救救我！”

languages.text: "Nein! Was ist mit dem Symbol? Dem Omen? Ihr ... Ihr solltet ..." {n}Die müden Augen des Mannes füllen sich mit Entsetzen, das rasch Hysterie weicht. Seine Knie geben nach und er wankt heftig, ehe er mit einem erbärmlichen Schrei auf die Gleise stürzt.{/n} "Nein! Hilfe!"
languages.original_text: "No! What about the symbol? The portent? You... you were supposed to..." {n}The man's tired eyes fill with horror that quickly turns into hysteria. His knees buckle, and he staggers heavily before falling onto the tracks with a pitiful cry.{/n} "No! Help!"

traits.locale_text: "Nein! Was ist mit dem Symbol? Dem Omen? Ihr ... Ihr solltet ..." {n}Die müden Augen des Mannes füllen sich mit Entsetzen, das rasch Hysterie weicht. Seine Knie geben nach und er wankt heftig, ehe er mit einem erbärmlichen Schrei auf die Gleise stürzt.{/n} "Nein! Hilfe!"

languages.text: "Hayır! Sembol ne olacak? Peki ya kehanet? Siz... Vazifeniz..." {n}Adamın yorgun gözleri, yerini çabucak histeriye bırakan bir dehşetle doluyor. Dizleri bükülürken afallıyor ve acınası bir feryatla raylara düşüyor.{/n} "Hayır! Yalvarırım!"
languages.original_text: "No! What about the symbol? The portent? You... you were supposed to..." {n}The man's tired eyes fill with horror that quickly turns into hysteria. His knees buckle, and he staggers heavily before falling onto the tracks with a pitiful cry.{/n} "No! Help!"
